title: Negative Dye
summaries: Negative Dye is a type of dye bought from the Dye Trader during a full moon, or given as a possible reward for turning in a Strange Plant. When applied, it will completely invert the color of dyed armor or accessories. It is not combinable with other dyes.

statistics.Buy: 3 GC75 SC
statistics.Sell: 75 SC
